summary: GST compliance, Refund, Litigation, Tax optimization, Audit, Assessment, Customs, EXIM (SEZ, STPI, FTA, FTA, EOU, DGFT) Central Excise, Sales tax, Service tax and others related commercial activities

education.field_of_study: Taxation, Finance, Corporate Tax, Advance Accountancy

profile_positions.description: All Indirect Tax related compliance and make procedures with legal compliance with refund claims from GST, Customs, VAT, Service Tax & DGFT. Appeals & Auditing.  We have a team to concentrate on all auditing work.
profile_positions.title: Law Practice & Tax Consultant

profile_positions.description:
EXIM, Customs & DGFT, GST Compliance, Legal, Refund related commercial activities.
GST Compliance - for validating and approve the monthly, annual returns. 
To ensure to file the various case in respective judicial form.
Monitoring import and export transaction and timely give advice.
Chairperson of the Company in Indirect tax to give tax advice for various business transaction. 
Maintaining the Tax Master to update correct HSN/SAC Code & GST Rates.
Ensuring to take input credit from all eligible services. 
Coordinate to implement e-invoicing procedure.
Implement the refund procedure. 
Developing the various tech report to avoid missing input credit.
profile_positions.title: Group Senior Manager Indirect Tax & Commercial

profile_positions.description:
Head of Taxation (IDT)
1. Tax Planning, Advisory, Supervision, Co-Ordination & Monitoring of Statutory Compliance of the Group Companies
2. Project Screening Committee – Commercial & Indirect Taxation
3. Legal & Litigation Management
4. Commercial & Contract Management
5. Treasury Management
6. Inventory Management
7. Supply Chain Management
8. Team Building, Motivation & Development
9. Chairperson of the Company in Indirect tax (GST, Service Tax, Central Excise, Sales Tax, DGFT, EXIM, Customs, & other tax related commercial works). 
10. Effective involvement in Supervision, Co-Ordination, Monitoring of Internal Controls, 11. Internal Audits & Statutory Audits.
11. Implement of Refund activities in various government department.
12. Chairperson of the company to implement, migrate and development of any ERP systems, (SAP, Oracle & Others.)

profile_positions.title: Group Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Head of Indirect Taxes compliance,
Handling various external & internal audit. 
Submit quarterly return by head wise TCS & TDS, 
Accounts Receivable - Take 100% responsibility to collect the money from B2B customers and submit ageing report to VP by weekly.
Accounts Payable - Take 100% responsibility to make the money to suppliers and submit ageing report to VP by weekly .
Selling tools to Hyundai, Nissan & Ford and maintain amortization cost,
profile_positions.title: Group Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sales Accounting, Logistic, Employee Management, Budget, MIS, Product P&L

Admin:
All legal matters, Accounting, Taxation, Admin in the South Region, Interface cross-functionally at all levels within the Factory and Head office of the company, including

Accounting: 
Statutory compliances with respect to VAT, Excise, sales tax and all Labour compliances, Timely closure of books of accounts- Month & Quarter, Sales Tax forms collection, Trial balance review, Product wise Segment wise P & L review, 

Stock Controlling: 
Stock control & Hygiene - To maintain FIFO, Stacking Norms, Stock Ageing, Physical stock taken, Prepare forecast budget and indent order in timely.

Logistic Management:
Supply chain function and ensure correct billing as per dealer Order and Credit Policy, Space Utilization, Control freight cost, Regional logistics and admin support, After getting order Perform analytical and logistics planning, Placing truck for loading and follow up for unloading at the place of delivery.

Employee Management:
Team building, set individual target, Select the right candidate to the requirement job like, Area salesman, storekeeper, office management staff, temporary workers, Payroll process and respective tax compliance. Review salesperson reimbursement bills and settled their claims as per the company standard.  

Dealer Management: 
Find and Explore the opportunity available in the market, Settlement of dealer claims and control local sales promotion cost, Effective & Cost effective delivery system for dealer satisfaction and defective stock clearance, Fix the credit limit, arranging the agreement,  

Sales Planning:
Data collection, analysis, validation and cultivation new sales leads to establish business. Forecasting future business to fulfil the requirement. Maintaining existing and securing new business. 

MIS Report:
Maintaining daily, weekly, and monthly visit and performance report of entire branch.
profile_positions.title: Regional Manager
